item.description:
Something special for New Year's Day! Fight that hangover and join me at the Criterion in New Haven to see THE WIZARD OF OZ in vibrant color on the big screen. If you've never seen this film large, as it was meant to be, you are in for a treat.

I'm sure many of you grew up watching this film every year on television, as I did. But it wasn't until I watched it in film class in college I truly appreciated its merits as an adult. It is one of the best films ever made and shows up on critics top 10 lists with regularity. It was way ahead of its time from the perspective of special affects and color. You can read more about the film at Wikipedia:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wizard_of_Oz_(1939_film)

Admission price is $5.00 or $4.00 for Criterion Club members. Membership is free:

http://www.bowtiecinemas.com/join-club.html

After the movie, we'll have lunch at Wicked Wolf, just down the street at 144 Temple Street. unfortunately, temple Grill will not be open January 1.

Feel free to join me for one or both parts of this event.
item.name: The Wizard of Oz at the Criterion in New Haven & Lunch at Wicked Wolf Tavern
